Families with pensioners should receive emergency subsidy too, says Hontiveros tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736098 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736098/families-with-pensioners-should-receive-emergency-subsidy-too-says-hontiveros/story/ All families with senior citizens, including those who are recipients of pensions, must be included on the list of beneficiaries for the social amelioration program of the government, Senator Risa Hontiveros said Wednesday. Wed, 29 Apr 2020 15:39:30 +0800

(Mynt) announced Wednesday. Wed, 29 Apr 2020 15:37:50 +0800
Bato defends AFP chief s request to Chinese envoy: I would even reach out to a quack doctor tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736095 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736095/bato-defends-afp-chief-s-request-to-chinese-envoy-i-would-even-reach-out-to-a-quack-doctor/story/ "If I were in his shoes as a COVID-19 patient, I would even reach out to a quack doctor just to stay alive," Senator Ronald dela Rosa said. "Nothing is wrong. In times of crisis we have to be practical." Wed, 29 Apr 2020 15:33:50 +0800
Gov't underreporting jail deaths amid COVID-19 pandemic --Human Rights Watch tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736087 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736087/gov-t-underreporting-jail-deaths-amid-covid-19-pandemic-human-rights-watch/story/ The Philippine government has not fully reported prison deaths, Human Rights Watch said, expressing concern that the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) has been spreading more rapidly and widely in the country's jail system. Wed, 29 Apr 2020 15:20:50 +0800

Wed, 29 Apr 2020 15:17:04 +0800

DOH exec: No evidence weather affects transmission of COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736077 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736077/doh-exec-no-evidence-weather-affects-transmission-of-covid-19/story/ "Wala pa rin talagang ebidensya para makapagsabi kung mainit o kaya malamig ay mas magsu-survive o mamamatay ang virus," Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said at a virtual press briefing. "Sa ngayon po wala tayong ginagamit na ganiyang pamantayan," she added. Wed, 29 Apr 2020 13:51:34 +0800
